name: pl_hostname
label: Host Star Name
description: Stellar name most commonly used in the literature.

name: pl_letter
label: Planet Letter
description: Letter assigned to the planetary component of a planetary system.

name: pl_discmethod
label: Discovery Method
description: Method by which the planet was first identified.

name: pl_pnum
label: Number of Planets in System
description: Number of planets in the planetary system.

name: pl_orbper
label: Orbital Period (days)
description:
Time the planet takes to make a complete 
 orbit around the host star or system.

name: pl_orbsmax
label: Orbit Semi-Major Axis (AU)
description: The longest diameter of an elliptic orbit.

name: pl_orbeccen
label: Eccentricity
description:
Amount by which the orbit of the planet 
 deviates from a perfect circle.

name: pl_orbincl
label: Inclination (deg)
description:
Angular distance of the orbital
 plane from the line of sight.

name: pl_massj
label: Planet Mass (Jupiter mass)
description:
Amount of matter contained in the planet, 
 measured in units of masses of Jupiter.

name: pl_msinij
label: Planet M*sin(i) (Jupiter mass)
description: Minimum mass of a planet as measured by radial velocity, measured in units of masses of Jupiter.

name: pl_radj
label: Planet Radius (Jupiter radii)
description: Length of a line segment from the center of the planet to its surface, measured in units of radius of Jupiter.

name: pl_dens
label: Planet Density (g/cm**3)
description: Amount of mass per unit of volume of the planet.

name: pl_ttvflag
label: TTV Flag
description:
Flag indicating if the planet orbit exhibits 
 transit timing variations from another planet
 in the system (1=yes, 0=no).

name: pl_kepflag
label: Kepler Field Flag
description: Flag indicating if the planetary system signature is present in data taken with the Kepler mission (1=yes, 0=no).

name: ra_str
label: RA (sexagesimal)
description: Right Ascension of the planetary system in sexagesimal format.

name: dec_str
label: Dec (sexagesimal)
description: Declination of the planetary system in sexagesimal notation.

name: ra
label: RA (decimal degrees)
description: Right Ascension of the planetary system in decimal degrees.

name: dec
label: Dec (decimal degrees)
description: Declination of the planetary system in decimal degrees.

name: st_dist
label: Distance (pc)
description: Distance to the planetary system in units of parsecs.

name: st_vj
label: V-band (Johnson) [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using 
 the V (Johnson) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_teff
label: Effective  Temperature (K)
description: Temperature of the star as modeled by a black body emitting the same total amount of electromagnetic radiation.

name: st_mass
label: Stellar Mass (solar mass)
description:
Amount of matter contained in the star, 
 measured in units of masses of the Sun.

name: st_rad
label: Stellar Radius (solar radii)
description: Length of a line segment from the center of the star to its surface, measured in units of radius of the Sun.

name: hd_name
label: HD Name
description: Name of the star as given by the Henry Draper Catalog.

name: hip_name
label: HIP Name
description: Name of the star as given by the Hipparcos Catalog.

name: pl_name
label: Planet Name
description: Planet name most commonly used in the literature.

name: pl_tranflag
label: Planet Transit Flag
description: Flag indicating if the planet transits its host star (1=yes, 0=no)

name: pl_rvflag
label: Planet RV Flag
description: Flag indicating if the planet host star exhibits radial velocity variations due to the planet (1=yes, 0=no)

name: pl_imgflag
label: Planet Imaging Flag
description:
Flag indicating if the planet has been 
observed via imaging techniques (1=yes, 0=no)

name: pl_astflag
label: Planet Astrometry Flag
description: Flag indicating if the planet host star exhibits astrometrical variations due to the planet (1=yes, 0=no)

name: pl_omflag
label: Orbital Modulation Flag
description: Flag indicating whether the planet exhibits orbital modulations on the phase curve (1=yes, 0=no)

name: pl_cbflag
label: Circumbinary Flag
description: Flag indicating whether the planet orbits a binary system (1=yes, 0=no)

name: pl_orbtper
label: Time of Periastron (Julian Days)
description:
The time at which the orbiting body is at its closest 
approach to the star it orbits (i.e. is at periastron).

name: pl_orblper
label: Longitude of Periastron (deg)
description:
The angular separation between the ascending node of 
the orbit and the location in the orbit of periastron.

name: pl_eqt
label: Planet Equilibrium Temperature (K)
description:
Temperature of the planet as modeled by a 
black body heated only by its host star.

name: pl_insol
label: Insolation Flux [Earth flux]
description: Insolation flux is another way to give the equilibrium temperature. It's given in units relative to those measured for the Earth from the Sun.

name: pl_masse
label: Planet Mass (Earth mass)
description:
Amount of matter contained in the planet, 
measured in units of masses of the Earth.

name: pl_msinie
label: Planet M*sini(i) (Earth mass)
description:
Minimum mass of a planet as measured by radial 
velocity, measured in units of masses of Earth.

name: pl_rade
label: Planet Radius (Earth radii)
description:
Length of a line segment from the center of the planet to 
its surface, measured in units of radius of the Earth.

name: pl_rads
label: Planet Radius (solar)
description:
Length of a line segment from the center of the planet 
to its surface, measured in units of radius of the Sun.

name: pl_trandep
label: Transit Depth (percentage)
description:
The size of the relative flux decrement caused by 
the orbiting body transiting in front of the star.

name: pl_trandur
label: Transit Duration (days)
description:
The length of time from the moment the planet begins to 
cross the stellar limb to the moment the planet finishes
crossing the stellar limb.

name: pl_tranmid
label: Transit Midpoint (Julian days)
description:
The time given by the average of the time the planet 
begins to cross the stellar limb and the time the 
planet finishes crossing the stellar limb.

name: pl_tsystemref
label: Time System Reference

name: pl_occdep
label: Occultation Depth
description: Depth of occultation of secondary eclipse

name: pl_ratdor
label: Planet-Star Distance over Star Radius
description:
The distance between the planet and the star at 
 mid-transit divided by the stellar radius. For 
 the case of zero orbital eccentricity, the distance 
 at mid-transit is the semi-major axis of the planetary orbit.

name: pl_ratror
label: Planet-Star Radius Ratio
description: The planet radius divided by the stellar radius.

name: pl_disc
label: Year of Discovery
description: Year the planet was discovered.

name: pl_status
label: Status
description:
Status of the planet 
(1 = announced, 
2 = submitted, 
3 = accepted, 
0 = retracted).

name: pl_mnum
label: Number of Moons in System
description: Number of moons detected in the planetary system.

name: pl_st_npar
label: Number of Stellar and Planet Parameters
description: Number of Stellar and Planet Parameters

name: pl_st_nref
label: Number of Stellar and Planet References
description: Number of Stellar and Planet References

name: pl_pelink
label: Link to Exoplanet Encyclopaedia
description: It links to the planet page in the Exoplanet Encyclopaedia.

name: pl_edelink
label: Link to Exoplanet Data Explorer
description: It links to the planet page in Exoplanet Data Explorer.

name: pl_publ_date
label: Publication Date
description: Publication Date of the planet discovery referee publication.

name: rowupdate
label: Date of Last Update
description: Date of last update of the planet parameters.

name: st_glon
label: Galactic Longitude (deg)
description:
Galactic longitude of the planetary 
system in units of decimal degrees.

name: st_glat
label: Galactic Latitude (deg)
description:
Galactic latitude of the planetary 
system in units of decimal degrees.

name: st_elon
label: Ecliptic Longitude (deg)
description:
Ecliptic longitude of the planetary 
system in units of decimal degrees.

name: st_elat
label: Ecliptic Latitude (deg)
description:
Ecliptic latitude of the planetary 
system in units of decimal degrees.

name: st_plx
label: Parallax (mas)
description:
Difference in the angular position of a star 
as measured at two opposite positions within 
the Earth's orbit.

name: st_pmra
label: RA Proper Motion (mas/yr)
description:
Angular change in right ascension over time as 
seen from the center of mass of the Solar System.

name: st_pmdec
label: Dec Proper Motion (mas/yr)
description:
Angular change in declination over time as seen 
from the center of mass of the Solar System.

name: st_pm
label: Proper Motion  (mas/yr)
description:
Angular change in position over time as seen 
from the center of mass of the Solar System.

name: st_radv
label: Radial Velocity (km/sec)
description:
Velocity of the star in the 
direction of the line of sight.

name: st_spstr
label: Stellar Spectral Type
description:
Classification of the star based 
on their spectral characteristics 
following the Morgan-Keenan system.

name: st_logg
label: Surface Gravity
description: Gravitational acceleration experienced at the stellar surface.

name: st_lum
label: Luminosity [log(solar)]
description:
Amount of energy emitted by a star per unit 
time, measured in units of solar luminosities.

name: st_dens
label: Stellar Density [g/cm**3]
description: Amount of mass per unit of volume of the star.

name: st_metfe
label: Stellar Metallicity (dex)
description:
Measurement of the metal content 
of the photosphere of the star as
compared to the hydrogen content.

name: st_metratio
label: Metallicity Ratio
description:
Ratio for the Metallicity Value 
([Fe/H] denotes iron abundance, 
[M/H] refers to a general metal content)

name: st_vsini
label: Rotational Velocity v*sin(i) [km/s]
description:
Rotational velocity at the equator 
of the star multiplied by the sine 
of the inclination.

name: st_acts
label: Stellar Activity Index (S-Index)
description:
Chromospheric activity as measured by the 
S-index (ratio of the emission of the H 
and K Ca lines to that in nearby continuum).

name: st_actr
label: Stellar Activity Log (R'HK)
description:
Chromospheric activity as measured by 
the log(R' HK) index, with is based 
on the S-index, but excludes the 
photospheric component in the Ca lines.

name: st_actlx
label: x-ray Activity (Lx)"
description:
Stellar activity as measured by 
the total luminosity in X-rays.

name: swasp_id
label: SWASP Identifier
description:
Name of the star as given by the SuperWASP 
(Wide Angle Search for Planets) project.

name: st_nts
label: Number of Time Series
description:
Number of literature time series available 
for this star in the NASA Exoplanet Archive

name: st_nplc
label: Number of Planet Transit Light Curves
description:
Number of literature transit light curves available 
for this star in the NASA Exoplanet Archive.

name: st_nglc
label: Number of General Light Curves
description:
Number of Hipparcos light curves available 
for this star in the NASA Exoplanet Archive.

name: st_nrvc
label: Number of Radial Velocity Light Curves
description:
Number of literature radial velocity curves available 
for this star in the NASA Exoplanet Archive.

name: st_naxa
label: Number of Amateur Light Curves
description:
Number of literature amateur light curves available 
for this star in the NASA Exoplanet Archive.

name: st_nimg
label: Number of Images
description:
Number of literature images available for 
this star in the NASA Exoplanet Archive.

name: st_nspec
label: Number of Spectra
description:
Number of literature of spectra available for 
this star in the NASA Exoplanet Archive.

name: st_uj
label: U-band (Johnson) [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using 
the U (Johnson) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_bj
label: B-band (Johnson) [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using 
the B (Johnson) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_rc
label: R-band (Cousins) [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using the 
R (Cousins) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_ic
label: I-band (Cousins) [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using the 
I (Cousins) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_j
label: J-band (2MASS) [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using the 
J (2MASS) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_h
label: H-band (2MASS) [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using the 
H (2MASS) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_k
label: Ks-band (2MASS) [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using the 
K (2MASS) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_wise1
label: WISE 3.4um [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using
the 3.4um (WISE) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_wise2
label: WISE 4.6um [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using
the 4.6um (WISE) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_wise3
label: WISE 12.um [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using
the 12.um (WISE) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_wise4
label: WISE 22.um [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using
the 22.um (WISE) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_irac1
label: IRAC 3.6um [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using 
the 3.6um (IRAC) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_irac2
label: IRAC 4.5um [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using 
the 4.5um (IRAC) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_irac3
label: IRAC 5.8um [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using 
the 5.8um (IRAC) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_irac4
label: IRAC 8.0um [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using 
the 8.0um (IRAC) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_mips1
label: MIPS 24um [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using 
the 24um (MIPS) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_mips2
label: MIPS 70um [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using 
the 70um (MIPS) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_mips3
label: MIPS 160um [mag]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured using 
the 160um (MIPS) band in units of magnitudes.

name: st_iras1
label: IRAS 12um [Jy]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured 
using the 12um (IRAS) band in units of Jy.

name: st_iras2
label: IRAS 25um [Jy]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured 
using the 25um (IRAS) band in units of Jy.

name: st_iras3
label: IRAS 60um [Jy]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured 
using the 60um (IRAS) band in units of Jy.

name: st_iras4
label: IRAS 100um [Jy]
description:
Brightness of the host star as measured 
using the 100um (IRAS) band in units of Jy.

name: st_photn
label: Number of Photometry Measurements
description:
Number of photometry measurements available 
for this star in the NASA Exoplanet Archive.

name: st_umbj
label: U-B (Johnson) [mag]
description:
Color of the star as measured by the 
difference between U and B (Johnson) bands.

name: st_bmvj
label: B-V (Johnson) [mag]
description:
Color of the star as measured by the 
difference between B and V (Johnson) bands.

name: st_vjmic
label: V-I (Johnson-Cousins) [mag]
description:
Color of the star as measured by the difference 
between V (Johnson) and I (Cousins) bands.

name: st_vjmrc
label: V-R (Johnson-Cousins) [mag]
description:
Color of the star as measured by the difference
between V (Johnson) and R (Cousins) bands.

name: st_jmh2
label: J-H (2MASS) [mag]
description:
Color of the star as measured by the 
difference between J and H (2MASS) bands.

name: st_hmk2
label: H-Ks (2MASS) [mag]
description:
Color of the star as measured by the 
difference between H and K (2MASS) bands.

name: st_jmk2
label: J-Ks  (2MASS) [mag]
description:
Color of the star as measured by the 
difference between K and K (2MASS) bands.

name: st_bmy
label: b-y (Stromgren) [mag]
description:
Color of the star as measured by the difference 
between b and y (Stromgren) bands.

name: st_m1
label: m1 (Stromgren) [mag]
description:
Color of the star as measured by 
the m1 (Stromgren) system.

name: st_c1
label: c1 (Stromgren) [mag]
description:
Color of the star as measured 
by the c1 (Stromgren) system.

name: st_colorn
label: Number of Color Measurements
description:
Number of color measurements available 
for this star in the NASA Exoplanet Archive.
